title: Workflow State Input
description: Input parameters for managing workflow state operations including creation, status updates, and queries.

workflow_id.description: Workflow ID for operations on existing workflows

external_source.description: Path to archived spec file (used for create_workflow with external source)

item_id.description: Item ID within the workflow (used for create_item)

field.description: Status field to update (used for update_status)

status.description: New status value to set (used for update_status)

to_phase.description: Target phase for regression (used for regress)

reason.description: Reason for the regression (used for regress)
